text: Ara e'ibhabe bahukhodabadidera adhikansera jan'ya tadera ansidebatara cittakarsaka kareche tadera santana-hatya, yena tara edera dhbansa karate pare ara tadera dharmake tadera jan'ya bibhrantikara karate pare. Ara allah yadi icche karatena tabe tara e karato na, kaje'i tadera o tara ya jaliyati kare take upeksa karo.
